channel.title: 317 going live help?!?!?!?!?!
channel.description: i have a 317 client but idk how to port forward so im using it with hamachi. but then i got people to join my hamachi network and download my client so they did and it wouldnt let them log on! whats wrong? how do i fix it? :mad: :mad: :mad: :mad: :mad: :mad: :mad: :mad: :mad: :mad: :mad: :( :( :( :( :( :( :( :( :([br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 20, 2009, 11:37:06 pm[/size][hr]some information, idk if its important. the client im using is runeXC my ip is 5.241.22.248 my port is 43594 my hamachi network name is my ip the password is 123 i can get on my server fine but no one else can get on

item.title: 317 going live help?!?!?!?!?!
item.dc:creator: @Nuggetdabest Nuggetdabest
item.description:
@Nuggetdabest wrote:

1)Please Lay off the Emotion Smileys.
2)DO what Silabgarza said makes it easier
3)Make sure when you want them to connect just open Run.bat and Hamatchi.
4)There is no 4.

Read full topic

item.title: 317 going live help?!?!?!?!?!
item.dc:creator: @silabgarza silabgarza
item.description:
@silabgarza wrote:

just be careful with wat u do :3

or better yet, don’t host a server, its time consuming, and frustrating
i’ve been hosting/coding since Feb '08

sure i have something to do now, im not that bored, BUUUT ITS FRUSTRATING

so yah, best suggestion - don’t even bother hosting a server

@kicker862 wrote:

i have a 317 client but idk how to port forward so im using it with hamachi.
but then i got people to join my hamachi network and download my client so they did and it wouldnt let them log on!
whats wrong?
how do i fix it?
